testsuite.name: Scenario: Successfully access the Regrading page from question details page in gradebook

testcase.name: Given I set up the LTI consumer key and shared secret if not already done
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully access the Regrading page from question details page in gradebook

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully access the Regrading page from question details page in gradebook

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully access the Regrading page from question details page in gradebook

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully access the Regrading page from question details page in gradebook

testcase.name: When I choose "Mathematical Formula" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully access the Regrading page from question details page in gradebook

testcase.name: When I choose creating new assignment in "Default Unit" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully access the Regrading page from question details page in gradebook

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully access the Regrading page from question details page in gradebook

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully access the Regrading page from question details page in gradebook

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully access the Regrading page from question details page in gradebook

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully access the Regrading page from question details page in gradebook

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully access the Regrading page from question details page in gradebook

testcase.name: And I verify the timestamps are in the correct format

testcase.name: And I see that the submit new grades button is disabled
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully access the Regrading page from question details page in gradebook

testcase.name: When I select revision number 1
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully access the Regrading page from question details page in gradebook

testcase.name: Then I see that the submit new grades button is enabled
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully access the Regrading page from question details page in gradebook

testcase.name: When I submit all selected grades
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully access the Regrading page from question details page in gradebook

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully access the Regrading page from question details page in gradebook
